title: Labor Economics: (Borjas 6th) + (Ehrenberg 11th, Modern)
description:
Labor Economics, 6th edition (c2013), textbook by George J. Borjas.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mcgraw-hill.com/sites/0073523208/information_center_view0/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mcgraw-hill.com/sites/0073523208/information_center_view0/</a>

CONTENTS:
1. Introduction to Labor Economics
2. Labor Supply
3. Labor Demand
4. Labor Market Equilibrium
5. Compensating Wage Differentials
6. Human Capital
7. The Wage Structure
8. Labor Mobility
9. Labor Market Discrimination
10. Labor Unions
11. Incentive Pay
12. Unemployment

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF

----------------------------------

Modern Labor Economics: Theory and Public Policy, 11th edition (c2012), textbook by Ronald G. Ehrenberg & Robert S. Smith.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/Modern-Labor-Economics-Theory-and-Public-Policy/9780132540643.page" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/Modern-Labor-Economics-Theory-and-Public-Policy/9780132540643.page</a>
companion website: <a href=" http://wps.aw.com/aw_ehrensmith_mlaborecon_11/186/47806/12238540.cw/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://wps.aw.com/aw_ehrensmith_mlaborecon_11/186/47806/12238540.cw/index.html</a>

CONTENTS:
1. Introduction
2. Overview of the Labor Market
3. The Demand for Labor
4. Labor Demand Elasticities
5. Frictions in the Labor Market
6. Supply of Labor to the Economy: the Decision to Work
7. Labor Supply: Household Production, the Family, and the Life Cycle
8. Compensating Wage Differentials and Labor Markets
9. Investments in Human Capital: Education and Training
10. Worker Mobility: Migration, Immigration, and Turnover
11. Pay and Productivity: Wage Determination within the Firm
12. Gender, Race, and Ethnicity in the Labor Market
13. Unions and the Labor Market
14. Unemployment
15. Inequality in Earnings
16. The Labor Market Effects of International Trade and Production Sharing

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
